channel.title: Npc and mini game help
channel.description: hey guys ive looked everywhere and i just cant find out how to make monsters hit more as in say a rat hit slike 50 instead of 1 and i also need a very detailed tut on how to make a wave based minigame with pointrs reward or say get a better reward every wave say 1st wave u get 5m 2nd way 10m and so on then like 100m and a random weapon thats very good so if any1 can help or give me tuts i would be greatly appretiative
